name: Virus Hunter (Shadowspy101)
description:
FPS virus hunter game with separate room challenges where you will have to reach the end or complete the objective to finish the game.

After completing a level, sit by the  next level's door for a moment for it to open. (Counter clockwise level progression)

Controls:
Movement: WASD

Aiming: Mouse

Fire: Left Mouse Button

Sprint: Left Shift

Jump: Spacebar

Pause: END

Game devs:

Andrew D'Alessio: Project Manager, AI Specialist, Troubleshooter, Level designer, Actor Designer, VFX designer, UI Designer.

Christopher Morin: UI Designer, actor designer, UX Designer.

Rey Blanco: Actor, UX, Weapon, Model Designer.

Dawner Lopez (Me): Level designer, material designer, actor designer, SFX designer.
